topic.title: Plan Of Care Activity Supply - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity

SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::RQO or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRP
SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity
SHALL conform to CDA Clinical Statement
[CDA] Contains [1..1] @classCode = "SPLY", where its data type is ActClassSupply

[CCD] SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::RQO or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentSubstanceMood::PRP

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <component> <structuredBody> <component> <section> <entry> <supply classCode="SPLY"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25"/> <id root="725f9db3-d267-45d3-92e2-cf4657c432a9"/> </supply> </entry> </section> </component> </structuredBody> </component> </ClinicalDocument>
